headline: HSBC downgrades Big Banks: Analyst behind the call explains why
summary: Bank stocks are in focus after HSBC analysts downgraded Bank of America (BAC), JPMorgan (JPM), and Goldman Sachs (GS), citing valuation concerns. HSBC's head of US financials research, Saul Martinez, the analyst behind the note, tells Yahoo Finance why the firm downgraded the Big Bank names and which regional bank plays he prefers. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

content.title: HSBC downgrades Big Banks: Analyst behind the call explains why
content.description:
Bank stocks are in focus after HSBC analysts downgraded Bank of America (BAC), JPMorgan (JPM), and Goldman Sachs (GS), citing valuation concerns.

HSBC's head of US financials research, Saul Martinez, the analyst behind the note, tells Yahoo Finance why the firm downgraded the Big Bank names and which regional bank plays he prefers.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.
